data.text: @MadAboutPaper @Cycling_604 @BCGovNews I hope so. We're all tired of covid .
@TrendlinesDotCa @BCGovNews There's over 30 million people in Canada...
@BCGovNews Is BC following the science or is the rest of Canada?
@divine9913 @Cycling_604 @BCGovNews It may mean they have improved and moved to regular hospital ward. 🤷
@MadAboutPaper @Cycling_604 @BCGovNews That's what i think. I think when they say for example, -6 in icu its passing away. Because they don't specify otherwise. 😒
@BCGovNews Cases expected to go down once bonnie reaches her book sales goal
@BCGovNews Amazing what happens when you basically cut off testing to the general population eh?

@Marmala83215229 @edwardfrancis12 @BCGovNews So it's not selfish, and illogical, to demand healthy young people who r not at risk of serious illness get a jab that doesn't stop infection or spread? And those at risk aren't protected by their own jab either? Who exactly is being protected? No one, just your feelings.

@BCGovNews What's the cfr, around 1.2%? And what's the cfr of the flu? Oh similar right, but we drive the jab free into poverty and depression, turn them into "lessers", bc they MIGHT get sick, all while allowing infected jabbed to work in hospital and admitting jabbed spread as well. Fu
@BCGovNews Why don't you show the 50 percent rate for fully vaxxed,, then everyone would know your first two numbers count for shit  , inaccurate to start with but hold less and less water lol  LIES
